title: 김병수

2013. "결혼이주여성의 사회연결망과 교육지원행위에 관한 탐색적 연구: 한국인과의 관계형성 과정 및 유형을 중심으로" 가족과문화.

2011. "이주노동자 태도에 대한 교육효과 분해: 한국, 일본, 대만 비교연구" 한국인구학 34(1): 129-157.
2011. "The Impact of International Migration on Unemployment Rates in Urban America," Journal of International and Area Studies 18(1): 49-64.
2011. "A Comparative Study of the Relationship between Production Regimes and Workers` Commitment," Korean Journal of Sociology 45(3): 171-193.
2011. Spin-offs and Corporate Governance: Listed Firms in China`s Stock Markets, edited by Jean C. Oi, Stanford University Press.
2011. "State Interests and Welfare Policymaking," Korea Social Science Journal 38(1): 41-76
2010. "Rethinking the Fundamental Sources of Racial Poverty in the Contemporary American Metropolitan Areas," Population and Society 6(1): 1-29.
2009. "Immigration, Race, and Labor Market Structures in American Metropolitan Areas," Korean Social Science Journal 36(2): 139-166.
2008. "Institutionalism and Capitalism: A Dialectical and Historical Contingency Approach," Research in Political Sociology 17(1): 67-97
2007. "Differential Impact of Repression on Social Movements in South Korea," Sociological Inquiry 27(3): 326-355 .
